name: Hebiko
text: Fuma-chan! Shikanosuke-chan! Hurry up!
The download had finished just in the nick of time, and we had been able to slip out of the room before the enemies came storming in.

name: Shikanosuke
text: I was worried about what would happen if the exit was blocked...

name: Me
text: Don't let your guard down yet, we have to get away from that room as quickly as possible.
After grabbing the data, all that was left was to escape. We were running full speed down the path we had previously come from.

name: Me
text: Shikanosuke! The path ahead is clear, right?

name: Shikanosuke
text: N-No!!

name: Me
text: No?

name: Shikanosuke
text: There's a horde of something non-human coming!!!

name: Hebiko
text: Non-human!?

name: Shikanosuke
text: D-Dogs and... big bee-like things... What are those!?

name: Me
text: Here they come!!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Whooaaa!!

name: Hebiko
text: Oof!
Without so much as a bark or growl, the dogs and bees suddenly started raining bullets on us.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Why is a dog shooting a machine gun?!!

name: Me
text: Those are no dogs! Those are UFS...

name: Hebiko
text: I-Isn't this pretty bad?!

name: Me
text: Yeah, those are UFS combat drones. Verbal communication is out of the question here.

name: Hebiko
text: What now!? Should Hebiko spray them with ink??

name: Me
text: No, unfortunately that's not going to work on drones.

name: Me
text: They don't use eyes, they have sensors to detect our positions. Just like Shikanosuke using his Electric Art as a sonar.

name: Hebiko
text: So that means blinding them won't work...

name: Shikanosuke
text: B-B-But you have another plan, right Fuma!?

name: Me
text: I never thought we'd have to fight drones. Sorry, but I don't have a plan.

name: Hebiko
text: If you have no plan, then...?

name: Me
text: That means we turn around and run!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Aieeeee!
I turned my back on the drones and started to sprint deeper into the buildingーmeaning the opposite direction from the entrance.

name: Shikanosuke
text: D-Did we lose them...?
I wasn't sure how far we had gone, fully absorbed in running away.
There was no sign of the drones, and our surroundings also looked quite different from before.

name: Me
text: (Where are we...? This area is clearly built differently from where we just came from.)

name: Hebiko
text: Hey, Fuma-chan?

name: Me
text: What's up?

name: Hebiko
text: There was only one entrance to this base, right?

name: Me
text: Yeah, at least according to the floorplan.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Huhhh!? Th-Then why did we run in the opposite direction!? That means we went even further into the base!!

name: Me
text: It's not like we had a choice.

name: Shikanosuke
text: That's truuuue, but... if we can't fight them and if there's also no way to get out... then that means this time it's all over for sure...

name: Me
text: We can't be certain that there's no way out. Take a look at this wall. It's built different from the area we just came from, right?

name: Hebiko
text: You're right. Why do you think that is?
Unlike the well-maintained walls from before, the walls in this area had old rocks or bits of concrete jutting out of them, with cracks all over.
The floor was deteriorating as well, breaking apart and sinking down, making it extremely difficult to walk on.

name: Me
text: This must be an older area... probably one of the underground tunnels of the factory that used to be here originally.
The reason the drones weren't chasing us might also have been because the floorplan for this old area wasn't in their system and it was taking them longer to locate us.

name: Shikanosuke
text: S-, s-s-s-so what does that mean!?

name: Me
text: This is an area that wasn't on the floorplan we received for the base. Which might mean that there's another way out.

name: Hebiko
text: So there's still hope!

name: Me
text: Yeah, but it looks like they won't let us get away that easily.
The group of combat drones from earlier appeared in front of us.

name: Me
text: (It's not like they couldn't find us... they took longer because they went around to cut us off...!!)
But that also gave us hope. The fact that they had cut us off meant that there really was another way out.

name: Me
text: Looks like we're going to have to somehow fight our way through them.

name: Shikanosuke
text: F-Fight our way through!? We'll be turned into swiss cheese if we try that in a narrow hallway like this!!

name: Me
text: Better be prepared to get shot. We just have to count on Hebiko's octopus tentacles.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Huh!? Hebiko!?
Hebiko's tentacles were able to regenerate. They would grow back even after getting sliced off.

name: Hebiko
text: W-Wait, you don't mean you're planning to use Hebiko's tentacles as a shield to break through the drone siege...?

name: Me
text: Bingo.

name: Hebiko
text: What a horrible way to treat a delicate lady's legs!

name: Me
text: That's the only option we have right now.

name: Hebiko
text: ...C'mon! They do heal quickly but it still hurts, you know!!
Hebiko continued complaining but quickly raised her tentacles and created a shield in front of us.

name: Me
text: We owe you! Alright, let's push through them!!
